review: Love it !! Easy to use also!

review: Love my fire tv stick. It's makes watching tv a pleasure. Who needs Cable when you have Internet???

review: I like it ok.. I thought it operated a little more like Chromecast and not happy that I have to pay to rent so many movies.

review: I love the stick it's way cheaper than having cable and I still can watch all my shows

review: works great most of the time...it will stall occasionally while watching or the little time wheel gets stuck at 25% and states to try again or re watch later which is annoying when trying to watch something, I will try again in several hours or the next day and it will work fine.
author: christina lehman

review: Easy install, went better than expected.  Installation video helped.
